resources.string: Nothing was found on your request
The article is not in the database. Starting the download.
Disabling ads, automatic cloud Sync and atmospheric fonts.
Disabling ads, automatic cloud sync, unlimited download articles and atmospheric fonts.
The license file could not be opened.
Disable ads and earn points for free!
Disable ads, increase the limit articles and earn points for free!
We\'ll show you the video and, after watching, temporarily disable ads. You can disable it as many times as you want!

Attention! Authorization is not required, but it needed for a cloud sync of the favorite articles, and read status. It also allows you to participate in the agent ranking. You can get further instructions from the head of the content area.

Optional feature includes disabling ads, all fonts without restriction, multiply all points you get by 3, and cloud synch of favorites and readings. And most importantly-subscribing, you\'re very motivating developers to quickly add features and fix bugs!

Optional feature includes disabling ads, unlimited download of articles to offline,all fonts without restriction, multiply all points you get by 3, and cloud synch of favorites and readings. And most importantly-subscribing, you\'re very motivating developers to quickly add features and fix bugs!

string-array.name: fag_items_content
string-array.item:
1. You can login in the left menu, moving above the button "Login".
 2. The entrance through the network requires an e-mail specified in the network because it is used as an ID in the server's database..
 3. Authorization is needed for keep read and favorites articles into the cloud and participate in ranking agents.

1. Works only for authorized agents.
 2. Need Internet connection.
 3. Works automatically for agents with a subscription.
 4. For economical agents needed manual sync. see "Settings".
 5. The status of the article is saved to the cloud and is read and added to the favorites.
 6. If you clean up application any unsynchronized data will be lost.

1. Works only for authorized agents.
 2. Need Internet connection.
 3. Works automatically for agents with a subscription.
 4. For economical agents needed manual sync. see "Settings"
 5. Points are awarded for: adding articles to your Favorites, reading articles, installing app, view ads, purchase in an application. Further the list will be expanded.
 6. All points apply modifiers - if you have subscription all received points will be increased
 7. As you receive your points, your clearance level will grow.
 8. Progress until the next level is shown by the green line around the Avatar.
 9. Number points to the next level are shown when you click on the Avatar.
 10. The Agent rating table is shown when you click on the avatar. t is updated every few minutes. Usually 5 minutes.

resources.string: Developers are grateful for your support!
Look at the cool application I found!
Watch video to disable ads for %1$d hours and get %2$d points
Install our other apps to disable Ads %1$d hours and get %2$d points!
Join the VK group to disable %1$d hours and get %2$d points!
Permission to access groups is required. Log again.
Requesting a password on the Server
The article could not be saved to the cloud.
A hack attempt has been registered. Quarantine mode activated.
The data could not be saved to the cloud. Error: %s
All data is saved to cloud! Saved %1$d articles, added %2$d points.
The data is already in sync,the data is already in sync,max level!
An error occurred while saving the image.

Attention, Staff! Clearance level l it\'s just a decorative inscription. It won\'t allow you to see remote data or access some hidden materials. You\'ll get only 3 things: 10000 points, the \"5 Clearance Level\" label and moral satisfaction from supporting developers, who work to improve the application)
Contacting the HR Department of the Foundation…
Are you sure want to logout? Rating system is disabled for unauthorized agents and you won\'t be able to use benefits of your already gained score or receive additional ones
The image could not be saved.Please try again.

Attention agents! You must be authorized to add and check a favorite article. This allows you to synchronize your data across the cloud on all your devices, also allows you to receive points and participate in the agent ranking!
There was an error reading the data.
Error-Another user has already registered with this email
You have %1$d points. You need %2$d to achieve next level
You have %1$d points. You have maximum access level!
New random article generates by server every some minutes.
This article is not translated yet.
Your device language - %1$s, an we have same app, where articles translated to %2$s. Want to install it?\n\nList of apps with different translates is always available in top right menu in any screen.
Sign in to disable ads for %1$d hours and get %2$d points, that will increase your offline articles limit!
Do you want to authorize first? After authorizing you\'ll get not only ads disabling, but also score increasing, which allows you to load more articles to read them offline!
Want to buy subscription to disable all ads and receive unlimited offline capabilities, authomated cloud sync and all fonts?
Want to try full version for free?
We want to offer you a free %1$d days trial of full version. You\'ll receive unlimited downloads, no ads, auto cloud sync and all fonts for %2$d days for FREE!
